author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Hardy Bucks Ride Again
text: The Hardy Bucks lads make their return to TV tonight for a brand new series following on from the success of their feature film two years ago. All the gang are back, Martin Maloney as Eddie Durkan, Chris Tordoff as The Viper, and Owen Colgan as Buzz McDonnall, as well as some new cast members including Fair Cityâ€™s Aoibheann McCaul, Susan Loughnane from Love/Hate, and even Brian Kennedy shows up. From what we've seen so far, it's crammed full of Hardy Bucks schtyle humour, so let's hope they can keep the Castletown magic going for another season.
